H0.text: What brand of durable German sandals was popular among hippie types. Teva

H1.text: What brand of durable German sandals was popular among hippie types. Mephisto

H2.text: What brand of durable German sandals was popular among hippie types. Ecco

H3.text: What brand of durable German sandals was popular among hippie types. Birki

A4.text: Birkenstock sandals became popular with hippies and others who had a 'back to nature' philosophy and appreciated the natural foot shape and foot-friendly comfort of Birkenstocks.

A5.text: In the United States, Birkenstocks were first popular among young men and later on among flower children, a group traditionally associated with American liberalism.
